introduction: In this episode of Autodesk Digital Builder, host Eric Thomas sits down with Tanya Custus, Director of AI Research at Autodesk, to discuss the role of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning in the construction industry. Tanya shares insights on how these technologies are helping teams improve their workflows and save time, as well as addressing potential risks and challenges associated with AI adoption. The conversation also touches on the importance of using AI as a collaborator rather than a replacement for human expertise.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to AI and ML
content: Explanation of AI and ML concepts and their applications in construction.
Discussion on how AI and ML are changing the built environment.
Overview of the benefits of using AI and ML in construction.
Introduction to Tanya Custus, Director of AI Research at Autodesk.

sections.title: Section 2: Real Risks and Challenges
content: Discussion on potential risks and challenges associated with AI adoption in construction.
Explanation of how teams can mitigate these risks and challenges.
Importance of using AI as a collaborator rather than a replacement for human expertise.
Tips for implementing AI in a design workflow.
topics: Risks and Challenges of AI Adoption

sections.title: Section 3: AI and Cloud Computing
content: Explanation of how cloud computing is changing the way AI is used in construction.
Discussion on the benefits of using cloud-based AI tools in construction.
Overview of the impact of AI on data management and storage in construction.
Introduction to Autodesk's cloud-based AI tools.

sections.title: Section 4: AI and Data Science
content: Explanation of the relationship between AI and data science in construction.
Discussion on how data science is helping teams make better decisions in construction.
Overview of the importance of data quality and management in construction.
Tips for using data science to improve construction workflows.

sections.title: Section 5: Future of AI in Construction
content: Discussion on the future of AI in construction and its potential impact on the industry.
Overview of the role of AI in addressing construction challenges such as labor shortages and sustainability.
Tips for staying up-to-date with AI developments in construction.
Conclusion and next steps for AI adoption in construction.

topics: Risks and Challenges of AI Adoption
